member.name: T:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint
member.summary: Represents one endpoint (or participant) in the network cluster.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.#ctor(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.String,Waher.Networking.Sniffers.ISniffer[])
member.summary: Represents one endpoint (or participant) in the network cluster.
member.param: UDP Multicast address used for cluster communication.
Shared secret. Used to encrypt and decrypt communication. Secret is UTF-8 encoded and then hashed before being fed to AES.
Optional set of sniffers to use.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.#ctor(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.Byte[],Waher.Networking.Sniffers.ISniffer[])
member.summary: Represents one endpoint (or participant) in the network cluster.
member.param: UDP Multicast address used for cluster communication.
Shared secret. Used to encrypt and decrypt communication. Secret is hashed before being fed to AES.
Optional set of sniffers to use.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.#ctor(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Boolean,Waher.Networking.Sniffers.ISniffer[])
member.summary: Represents one endpoint (or participant) in the network cluster.
member.param: UDP Multicast address used for cluster communication.
Shared secret. Used to encrypt and decrypt communication. Secret is hashed before being fed to AES.
If communication over the loopback interface should be permitted. (Default=false)
Optional set of sniffers to use.
